data.lyric:
[ti:Deer In Headlights (《五十度飞》电影插曲)]
[ar:Sia]
[al:Fifty Shades Freed (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Deer In Headlights - Sia (希雅)
[00:05.90]Written by：Sia Furler/Samuel Dixon
[00:11.80]Hoping for a miracle
[00:16.94]I'm not equipped for this but I can't move until I choose
[00:24.11]I need a crystal ball
[00:26.73]
[00:27.47]I'm falling apart and I can't take anymore
[00:32.02]
[00:32.62]Standing at the crossroads
[00:37.84]There's no right answer no one's brain to pick
[00:42.05]
[00:43.04]Under the spy
[00:46.59]
[00:48.53]There's no escaping I'm a deer caught in headlights
[00:52.84]
[00:53.71]I am hoping for a sign
[00:59.50]
[01:04.20]Something bring me right here
[01:11.19]
[01:13.89]Not in a drink not in a drift
[01:23.55]
[01:24.54]Please see me through metaphors in blue
[01:31.86]
[01:35.68]I'm holding on for dear life
[01:44.05]
[01:48.38]Ego I am a slave to you
[01:52.55]
[01:53.52]You're running the show my confidence is bruised
[01:58.77]Dumbstruck I'm falling further
[02:02.68]
[02:03.87]Down a shame spiral I am left in this
[02:08.50]
[02:09.64]I am hoping for a sign
[02:15.61]
[02:19.86]Something bring me right here
[02:27.20]
[02:29.53]Not in a drink not in a drift
[02:37.74]
[02:40.28]Please see me through metaphors in blue
[02:47.41]
[02:51.43]I'm holding on for dear life
[03:00.34]
[03:22.30]Something bring me right here
[03:33.05]Not in a drink not in a drift
[03:40.92]
[03:42.95]Please see me through metaphors in blue
[03:50.53]
[03:53.85]I'm holding on for dear life
[04:01.28]
[04:06.88]Spirit
[04:07.51]
[04:08.81]Please don't abandon me
data.trans:
[ti:Deer In Headlights (《五十度飞》电影插曲)]
[ar:Sia]
[al:Fifty Shades Freed (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.90]//
[00:11.80]期盼一个奇迹
[00:16.94]我尚未做好万全的准备 在我做出决定前 我不会轻举妄动
[00:24.11]我需要水晶球的指引
[00:26.73]
[00:27.47]我几欲崩溃 我已无法承受更多
[00:32.02]
[00:32.62]站在十字路口
[00:37.84]我没有确切的答案 没有人给我建议
[00:42.05]
[00:43.04]我活在别人的监视下
[00:46.59]
[00:48.53]我无处可逃 我像是被探照灯光芒笼罩的惊慌失措的鹿
[00:52.84]
[00:53.71]我期待着奇迹出现
[00:59.50]
[01:04.20]期待有征兆能助我逃离绝境
[01:11.19]
[01:13.89]不愿沉醉于美酒之中 也不愿自我放逐
[01:23.55]
[01:24.54]请助我逃离这绝望的困境
[01:31.86]
[01:35.68]我会为了美好的生活而坚持奋斗
[01:44.05]
[01:48.38]我狂妄自大 目中无人
[01:52.55]
[01:53.52]你操纵着舞台 将我的自信摧毁
[01:58.77]我被吓得目瞪口呆 我不停坠落
[02:02.68]
[02:03.87]坠入无尽的耻辱之中 我被遗弃于此
[02:08.50]
[02:09.64]我期待着奇迹出现
[02:15.61]
[02:19.86]期待有征兆能助我逃离绝境
[02:27.20]
[02:29.53]不愿沉醉于美酒之中 也不愿自我放逐
[02:37.74]
[02:40.28]请助我逃离这绝望的困境
[02:47.41]
[02:51.43]我会为了美好的生活而坚持奋斗
[03:00.34]
[03:22.30]期待有征兆能助我逃离绝境
[03:33.05]不愿沉醉于美酒之中 也不愿自我放逐
[03:40.92]
[03:42.95]请助我逃离这绝望的困境
[03:50.53]
[03:53.85]我会为了美好的生活而坚持奋斗
[04:01.28]
[04:06.88]我的勇气
[04:07.51]
[04:08.81]请不要弃我而去
